
{{alias}}( str, search, replacement[, fromIndex] )
    Replaces the substring after the first occurrence of a specified search
    string.

    Parameters
    ----------
    str: string
        Input string.

    search: string
        Search string.

    replacement: string
        Replacement string.

    fromIndex: integer (optional)
        Index from which to start the search. Default: `0`.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string
        Output string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'beep boop', ' ', 'foo' )
    'beep foo'
    > out = {{alias}}( 'beep boop', 'o', 'foo' )
    'beep bofoo'
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'Hello World!', 'l', 'foo', 3 )
    'Hellfoo'
    > var out = {{alias}}( 'beep boop beep baz', 'beep', 'foo', 5 )
    'beep boop beepfoo'

    See Also
    --------
